dcterms:description: A collection of 162 univariate time series of daily closing stock prices from China’s A-shares, selected based on earlier listing dates and fewer suspension days to minimize noise.
dcterms:title: Historical stock price data from China’s A-shares

dcterms:creator: Y. Wu
J. M. Hernández-Lobato
Z. Ghahramani
dcterms:description: A stochastic volatility model that utilizes Gaussian processes to characterize the dynamics of volatility.
dcterms:title: Gaussian process volatility model (GP-Vol)

dcterms:creator: Y. Wu
J. M. Hernández-Lobato
Z. Ghahramani
dcterms:description: A stochastic volatility model that utilizes Gaussian processes to characterize the dynamics of volatility.
dcterms:title: Stochastic volatility model (stochvol)

dcterms:creator: R. F. Engle
dcterms:description: Various models in the GARCH family, including ARCH, GARCH, GJR, AVARCH, AVGARCH, TARCH, EARCH, and EGARCH, used for modeling time-varying volatility.
dcterms:title: Various GARCH family models (ARCH, GARCH, GJR, AVARCH, AVGARCH, TARCH, EARCH, EGARCH)
